TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit CustomAttributeTypedArgument extends System.ValueType

summary.span: 代表在僅限反映的內容中自訂屬性的引數，或是代表陣列引數的項目。

span.span: Represents an argument of a custom attribute in the reflection-only context, or an element of an array argument.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 正在檢查的僅限反映的內容中的程式碼無法執行，因此它不一定要檢查的自訂屬性，藉由建立它們，然後檢查其屬性，請使用類似的方法的執行個體可能， ，依此類推.Code that is being examined in the reflection-only context cannot be executed, so it is not always possible to examine custom attributes by creating instances of them and then examining their properties, using methods like , , and so on. 如果屬性型別本身的程式碼已載入僅限反映的內容，就無法執行。If the code for the attribute type itself is loaded into the reflection-only context, it cannot be executed. 結構供類別來提供存取權的類型和位置引數指定自訂屬性執行個體，而不執行屬性建構函式的值。The structure is used by the class to provide access to the type and value of a positional argument specified for a custom attribute instance, without executing the attribute constructor. 它也提供存取的類型和值的具名引數不會執行的自訂屬性類型的對應屬性的程式碼。It also provides access to the type and value of a named argument without executing the code of the corresponding property of the custom attribute type. 所提供的類型和值屬性執行個體的所有位置和具名引數結構。The types and values of all the positional and named arguments of an attribute instance are provided by structures. 所傳回的位置屬性屬性都直接由結構，但所傳回的具名引數屬性都由結構; 若要取得具名引數使用的結構屬性。The positional attributes returned by the property are directly represented by structures, but the named arguments returned by the property are represented by structures; to get the structure for a named argument, use the property. 如果引數的值，陣列屬性，表示引數會傳回泛型的物件。If an argument is an array of values, the property of the that represents the argument returns a generic of objects. 每個集合中的物件，代表陣列的對應項目。Each object in the collection represents the corresponding element of the array. 若要建立的執行個體類別，請使用`static` factory 方法。To create instances of the class, use the `static` factory method. ## Examples 下列範例會定義具有四個建構函式和四個屬性的自訂屬性。The following example defines a custom attribute with four constructors and four properties. 兩個屬性是唯讀的而且設定使用的位置參數的建構函式。Two of the properties are read-only, and are set by using the positional parameters of the constructors. 其他兩個屬性是讀取/寫入，且可以設定只能藉由使用名為引數。The other two properties are read/write, and can be set only by using named arguments. 其中一個位置的屬性是字串的陣列，其中一個具名的屬性是整數的陣列。One positional property is an array of strings, and one named property is an array of integers. 屬性會套用至組件、組件中宣告的類型、類型的方法，以及方法的參數。The attribute is applied to the assembly, to a type declared in the assembly, to a method of the type, and to a parameter of the method. 在這些情況下，會使用不同的建構函式。Different constructors are used for these cases. 在執行時，組件本身載入僅限反映的內容，並顯示自訂屬性。When executed, the assembly loads itself into the reflection-only context and displays the custom attributes. 套用至類型的屬性會示範使用位置和具名引數的陣列內容。The attribute that is applied to the type demonstrates array properties, with both positional and named arguments. [!code-cpp[CustomAttributeData#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CustomAttributeData/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomAttributeData#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CustomAttributeData/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[CustomAttributeData#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/CustomAttributeData/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: The value of the custom attribute argument.

summary.span: 使用指定的值，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `value`參數不可為`null`這個建構函式，因為引數型別推斷的型別`value`。The `value` parameter cannot be `null` for this constructor, because the argument type is inferred from the type of `value`. 若要指定`null`值，請使用建構函式。To specify a `null` value, use the constructor. 這個建構函式是以供繼承類別。This constructor is for use by inheritors of the class. 它並不適用於應用程式程式碼中。It is not intended for use in application code.

span.span: is .

The value of the custom attribute argument.

summary.span: 使用指定的型別和值，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified type and value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式是以供繼承類別。This constructor is for use by inheritors of the class. 它並不適用於應用程式程式碼中。It is not intended for use in application code.

.property instance class System.Type ArgumentType
Public ReadOnly Property ArgumentType As Type

summary.span: 取得引數或陣列引數元素的型別。

span.span: Gets the type of the argument or of the array argument element.

value.span: 物件，表示引數或陣列元素的型別。

span.span: A object representing the type of the argument or of the array element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 對於簡單的引數或陣列引數的項目，這個屬性會識別所傳回的值的實際型別屬性。For simple arguments or for elements of array arguments, this property identifies the actual type of the value returned by the property. 陣列引數，這個屬性會傳回陣列的型別，但屬性會傳回`ReadOnlyCollection`(`ReadOnlyCollection(Of CustomAttributeTypedArgument)`在 Visual Basic 中) 中集合的每個項目代表陣列引數的對應項目。For array arguments, this property returns the array type, but the property returns a `ReadOnlyCollection` (`ReadOnlyCollection(Of CustomAttributeTypedArgument)` in Visual Basic) in which each element of the collection represents the corresponding element of the array argument. ## Examples 下列範例會定義具有四個建構函式和四個屬性的自訂屬性。The following example defines a custom attribute with four constructors and four properties. 兩個屬性是唯讀的而且設定使用的位置參數的建構函式。Two of the properties are read-only, and are set by using the positional parameters of the constructors. 其他兩個屬性是讀取/寫入，且可以設定只能藉由使用名為引數。The other two properties are read/write, and can be set only by using named arguments. 其中一個位置的屬性是字串的陣列，其中一個具名的屬性是整數的陣列。One positional property is an array of strings, and one named property is an array of integers. 屬性會套用至組件、組件中宣告的類型、類型的方法，以及方法的參數。The attribute is applied to the assembly, to a type declared in the assembly, to a method of the type, and to a parameter of the method. 在這些情況下，會使用不同的建構函式。Different constructors are used for these cases. 在執行時，組件本身載入僅限反映的內容，並顯示自訂屬性。When executed, the assembly loads itself into the reflection-only context and displays the custom attributes. 套用至類型的屬性會示範使用位置和具名引數的陣列內容。The attribute that is applied to the type demonstrates array properties, with both positional and named arguments. 屬性用於`ShowValueOrArray`顯示自訂屬性的資料，若要顯示的屬性類型的方法。The property is used in the `ShowValueOrArray` method that displays custom attribute data, to display the types of attributes. [!code-cpp[CustomAttributeData#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CustomAttributeData/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomAttributeData#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CustomAttributeData/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[CustomAttributeData#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/CustomAttributeData/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 傳回字串，其中包含引數名稱、等號，以及引數值的字串表示。

returns.span: 包含引數名稱、等號，以及引數值的字串表示的字串。

span.span: A string consisting of the argument name, the equal sign, and a string representation of the argument value.

.property instance object Value
Public ReadOnly Property Value As Object

summary.span: 針對簡單引數或陣列引數元素取得引數的值；針對陣列引數取得值集合。

span.span: Gets the value of the argument for a simple argument or for an element of an array argument; gets a collection of values for an array argument.

value.span: 表示引數值或元素值的物件，或表示陣列型別引數值之 物件的泛型 。

span.span: An object that represents the value of the argument or element, or a generic of objects that represent the values of an array-type argument.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果代表陣列引數，這個屬性會傳回`ReadOnlyCollection`(`ReadOnlyCollection(Of CustomAttributeTypedArgument)`在 Visual Basic 中)。If the represents an array argument, this property returns a `ReadOnlyCollection` (`ReadOnlyCollection(Of CustomAttributeTypedArgument)` in Visual Basic). 集合中的每個項目代表陣列引數的對應項目。Each element of the collection represents the corresponding element of the array argument. 值的類型可以使用來取得屬性。The type of the value can be obtained by using the property. 取得所傳回的值的實際型別簡單引數或陣列引數的項目屬性。 gets the actual type of the value returned by the property for simple arguments or for elements of array arguments. 它會傳回陣列引數的陣列型別。It returns the array type for array arguments. ## Examples 下列範例會定義具有四個建構函式和四個屬性的自訂屬性。The following example defines a custom attribute with four constructors and four properties. 兩個屬性是唯讀的而且設定使用的位置參數的建構函式。Two of the properties are read-only, and are set by using the positional parameters of the constructors. 其他兩個屬性是讀取/寫入，且可以設定只能藉由使用名為引數。The other two properties are read/write, and can be set only by using named arguments. 其中一個位置的屬性是字串的陣列，其中一個具名的屬性是整數的陣列。One positional property is an array of strings, and one named property is an array of integers. 屬性會套用至組件、組件中宣告的類型、類型的方法，以及方法的參數。The attribute is applied to the assembly, to a type declared in the assembly, to a method of the type, and to a parameter of the method. 在這些情況下，會使用不同的建構函式。Different constructors are used for these cases. 在執行時，組件本身載入僅限反映的內容，並顯示自訂屬性。When executed, the assembly loads itself into the reflection-only context and displays the custom attributes. 套用至類型的屬性會示範使用位置和具名引數的陣列內容。The attribute that is applied to the type demonstrates array properties, with both positional and named arguments. 屬性用於`ShowValueOrArray`方法會顯示自訂屬性的資料，以顯示屬性的值。The property is used in the `ShowValueOrArray` method that displays custom attribute data, to display the values of attributes.
